name: Bobcat
overview: Mating season is late winter and kittens are usually born during early spring. Lifespan is up to 16 years. They are solitary animals that are most active at night (dawn and dusk). They have a great sense of hearing, smell and vision. Least concern.
habitat: Habitats include semi-dessert and bush land. Bobcats are great hunters so a habitat with lots of prey is perfect. Bobcats are usually territorial and solitary. For instance, females never share territory but some male territories overlap. Human population reduce their habitat space.
tags: bobcat lynx rufus mammal cat furry cat
